code: export var updateURLSearch=function updateURLSearch(search,param){var query=new URLSearchParams(search);Object.keys(param).forEach(function(key){query.set(key,"".concat(param[key]));});return query.toString();};export var setQuery=function setQuery(search,hash){var query=new URLSearchParams(search);Object.keys(hash).forEach(function(key){return query.set(key,String(hash[key]));});return query.toString();};export var clearNull=function clearNull(obj){Object.keys(obj).forEach(function(key){if(obj[key]==null)delete obj[key];});return obj;};export var toQueryString=function toQueryString(hash){var search=new URLSearchParams(hash);return"?".concat(search.toString());};
